data.message: Dear Facebook , I've been receiving messages from people ( some people who I don't know) who are not on my Friends list. Their messages go to my '' Other'' folder in my inbox. Can you please tell me how to change this? Is there a way to stop people unknown to me in sending me inbox messages? How do I get rid of this '' Other'' inbox folder? Thank you so much. I hope to hear from you soon.

replies.message: Hi Tabetha. Anyone on Facebook can send you a message, but messages that are filtered out of your inbox will appear in your Other folder. Although anyone can send you a message, you control the strictness of your filtering preferences. Learn to filter your message preferences in 5 easy steps from our Help Center here: https://www.facebook.com/help/www/116215745206219. - Sarah
Thank you so much for your help. God bless you.
Why did you take away the option for NO ONE to be able to send me messages? Facebook?
